titles.title: A bill to release a Federal reversionary interest and convey mineral interests in Chester County, Tennessee, and for other purposes.
A bill to release a Federal reversionary interest and convey mineral interests in Chester County, Tennessee, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry.
Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.
